transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Gabbar Singh.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Sunrise Crop Sciences pe baat kar rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ki bihaf mein senior manager baat kar raha hu kaise hain aap?
Customer: Lock kar do.
Customer: Sir badhiya hai sir.
Executive: Ki aapne abhi Neha ke sath registration hua hoga IndiaMART.
Customer: Nahi ho paya mam se ho nahi paya kyuki time nahi hai sir baat karne abhi isliye.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji aur aapne WhatsApp pe bhi usko not satisfied kar diya tha.
Customer: To satisfied hai hi nahi hai na sir isliye to not satisfied kiya hai satisfied hote to aaj ek aad do kam se kam consume to aate.
Customer: Koi lead hum le hi nahi raha product le hi nahi raha hamara.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To uska kya not satisfied hi honge usse to hum.
Executive: Ji ji ji samajh mein aa raha hai thoda sa brief karenge kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Issue ye aa raha hai ki apne product ke regarding wo aa hi nahi raha apne pe lead hi nahi aa raha aapke paas.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha ye hai na sare ab duniya mein itne product hai wo kisi ka mang raha hai uske regarding aane se kya matlab hai.
Customer: Ek minute rukna sir.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.

Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello sir voice aa raha hai aapko.
Customer: Dubara bulwana hai. Fattu hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' due to this issue.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for more details about the issue.

- Customer explained the issue in detail.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product, satisfaction
